name: House of Cards
description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

name: Game of Thrones
description: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, return after thousands of years in the North.

reviews.body: Last season ending could haven been better

name: Big Bang Theory
description: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

name: Silicon Valley
description: In the high-tech gold rush of modern Silicon Valley, the people most qualified to succeed are the least capable of handling success.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine, with his former student, in order to secure his family's financial future.
